# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than $100. Considering the high demand and limited supply, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an introductory price of $150. This is a special offer tailored for discerning individuals like yourself who appreciate superior products. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the best our product has to offer. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
